name: Peck
description:
* THIS GAME SHOULD BE PLAYED FULL-SCREEN *

Controls

- W (jump), A (left), S (attack), D(right)

A score based game where you must be the ONLY CHICKEN on the platform.

One chicken peck can lead to you or your enemies demise.

Created by Max Vuksan for the GMTK 2019 Game Jam.

Theme: Only One
